entries.meaning: Used to identify something as normally being in the area of the fireplace.
Pertaining to an activity normal to the household, usually associated with the living-room, whether or not it has a real fireplace.
examples: Every Wednesday we have a hearthside meeting of the family.
This is a good hearthside book.

entries.meaning: The area around the fireplace in the living-room of a family house.
examples: Working women are stressing out their male partners by discussing business problems around the family hearthside.
